quotations.author: — ${name}
channels.default.name: Welcome
channels.default.title: Welcome to this chat!
cli.ajax: Simple way to run `ajax.php` queries through command line.
cli.checkhtml: Simple way to run test HTML input against validation rules.
cli.configuration.parameter.describe: Describe what each parameter is intended for.
cli.configuration.parameter.explain: Explain where the value comes from.
cli.configuration.parameter.key: The key to change or remove.
cli.configuration.parameter.value: The value to set (interpreted as JSON if possible).
cli.configuration.scenario.unset: Remove any local key for a key.
cli.help.nosuchaction: I don’t know how I could do what you’re asking for. Maybe will you find what you want in the documentation below?
cli.messages.parameter.defaults: Replace missing messages by their english equivalent.
cli.quotations.parameter.author: Author of the quotation (if known).
configuration.ajax.backlog: Seconds of old posts shown when a user opens a channel.
configuration.ajax.channelsrate: Refresh rate for active channels (seconds between refreshes).
configuration.ajax.metarate: Refresh rate for active users in channels (seconds between refreshes).
configuration.ajax.postsrate: Refresh rate for new posts in channels (seconds between refreshes).
configuration.channels.filelength: Maximum number of post in one file.
configuration.channels.inactivity: Number of seconds a channel may be innactive before it is declared inactive.
configuration.channels.maxnum: Maximum number of simultaneous active channels.
configuration.channels.postlength: Maximum length (in octets) of a post, including tags.
configuration.channels.userinactivity: Number of seconds a user may be innactive before it is declared inactive on a channel.
configuration.debug: Set this to “true” to turn on debug mode.
configuration.users.inactivity: Number of seconds a user may be innactive before he is declared inactive.
configuration.users.maxpostrate: Maximum number of posts a user may post on all channels in one minute.
configuration.users.maxnum: Maximum number of simultaneous active users.
exceptions.entityalreadyinactive: The entity whose id is “${id}” is already inactive
exceptions.entitynamealreadytaken: The entity name “${name}” is already taken
exceptions.entitynamealredytaken: The name “${name}” is already in use
exceptions.invalidconfigurationvalue: Bad value given for configuration key “${key}”: ${expected} expected, ${given} given
